title: Forge throwing erroneous DeclarationError: Identifier already declared.
body:
### Component

Forge

### Have you ensured that all of these are up to date?

- [X] Foundry
- [X] Foundryup

### What version of Foundry are you on?

forge 0.2.0 (9ed1c37 2022-08-01T00:09:10.803586Z)

### What command(s) is the bug in?

forge test

### Operating System

macOS (Apple Silicon)

### Describe the bug

I have an issue with my tests , it looks like definiing custom errors twice is breaking the build.

I define similar custom error in both LandNFT and MarketPlace

When I run forget test , I am getting the following error:


```
Compiler run failed
error[2333]: DeclarationError: Identifier already declared.
 --> contracts/src/test/Marketplace.t.sol:6:1:
  |
6 | import "../Marketplace.sol";
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Note: The previous declaration is here:
  --> contracts/src/LandNFT.sol:16:1:
   |
16 | error CannotSetAddressZero();
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^



error[2333]: DeclarationError: Identifier already declared.
 --> contracts/src/test/Marketplace.t.sol:6:1:
  |
6 | import "../Marketplace.sol";
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Note: The previous declaration is here:
  --> contracts/src/LandNFT.sol:20:1:
   |
20 | error ComissionOutOfAllowedRange();
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^



error[2333]: DeclarationError: Identifier already declared.
 --> contracts/src/test/Marketplace.t.sol:6:1:
  |
6 | import "../Marketplace.sol";
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Note: The previous declaration is here:
  --> contracts/src/LandNFT.sol:21:1:
   |
21 | error InsufficientBalance();
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^



error[2333]: DeclarationError: Identifier already declared.
 --> contracts/src/test/Marketplace.t.sol:6:1:
  |
6 | import "../Marketplace.sol";
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Note: The previous declaration is here:
  --> contracts/src/LandNFT.sol:22:1:
   |
22 | error InvalidToken();
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^



error[2333]: DeclarationError: Identifier already declared.
 --> contracts/src/test/Marketplace.t.sol:6:1:
  |
6 | import "../Marketplace.sol";
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Note: The previous declaration is here:
  --> contracts/src/LandNFT.sol:25:1:
   |
25 | error MaxTilesReached();
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^



error[2333]: DeclarationError: Identifier already declared.
 --> contracts/src/test/Marketplace.t.sol:6:1:
  |
6 | import "../Marketplace.sol";
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Note: The previous declaration is here:
  --> contracts/src/LandNFT.sol:17:1:
   |
17 | error NoTilesSelected();
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^



error[2333]: DeclarationError: Identifier already declared.
 --> contracts/src/test/Marketplace.t.sol:6:1:
  |
6 | import "../Marketplace.sol";
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Note: The previous declaration is here:
  --> contracts/src/LandNFT.sol:23:1:
   |
23 | error NonExistentTokenURI();
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^



error[2333]: DeclarationError: Identifier already declared.
 --> contracts/src/test/Marketplace.t.sol:6:1:
  |
6 | import "../Marketplace.sol";
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Note: The previous declaration is here:
  --> contracts/src/LandNFT.sol:19:1:
   |
19 | error NotAuthorised();
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^



error[2333]: DeclarationError: Identifier already declared.
 --> contracts/src/test/Marketplace.t.sol:6:1:
  |
6 | import "../Marketplace.sol";
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Note: The previous declaration is here:
  --> contracts/src/LandNFT.sol:18:1:
   |
18 | error RegionAlreadyOwned();
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^



error[2333]: DeclarationError: Identifier already declared.
 --> contracts/src/test/Marketplace.t.sol:6:1:
  |
6 | import "../Marketplace.sol";
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Note: The previous declaration is here:
  --> contracts/src/LandNFT.sol:24:1:
   |
24 | error TransferFailed();
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
```

I do not think this should happen and opening an issue here for clarity

## Repro

* git clone https://github.com/realiotech/realioverse-contracts.git
* git checkout feat/refactor
* forge test

this is an issue with your contracts because you have duplicate error types

https://github.com/realiotech/realioverse-contracts/blob/69ed5985954f189dd6352d84d5a707f1a037aa34/contracts/src/LandNft.sol#L16-L25


https://github.com/realiotech/realioverse-contracts/blob/69ed5985954f189dd6352d84d5a707f1a037aa34/contracts/src/Marketplace.sol#L11-L20

which are both used by

https://github.com/realiotech/realioverse-contracts/blob/69ed5985954f189dd6352d84d5a707f1a037aa34/contracts/src/test/Marketplace.t.sol#L5-L6

closing as this is a solidity error `DeclarationError: Identifier already declared. `
